Posts.Content: Oct 2, 2009 03:11PM kt05 wrote: I share your frustration.  My oncotype DX score is also 18 and my doctor has given me 2 options:  Tamoxifen fro 5 years or enter the Tailorx study where there is a 50-50 chance of receiving chemotherapy.  I want someone to tell me what to do!  My docotors have all told me they just don't know if chemotherapy could lower my risk of  returning.   My cancer was ILC, stage I, ER+/PR+,HER2- and I opted for a mastectomy because there were 4 separate tumors ranging in size from 1mm to 1.3 cm.  The four tumors is what keeps me up at night and the fact that my breast surgeon described my cancer as "squirrelly".  Plus I am only 48!
Posts.Title: Oncotype DX Score 18 ~~ what now? MaryNY MaryNY
